ingredients.item: 4 tbsp essential Waitrose crunchy peanut butter
½ tbsp essential Waitrose sunflower oil
4 essential Waitrose British chicken thigh fillets, thinly sliced

instructions.step: Boil the soya beans in water for 2 minutes, drain, refresh in cold water and set aside. Mix 1 tbsp water into the peanut butter, then stir in the soy sauce, lime juice and sesame oil. Set aside.

Heat the sunfl ower oil in a wok over a high heat until smoking, then add the chicken and stir-fry for 3 minutes until browned. Toss in the chilli and the vegetable stir fry, then cook for 1 minute more.

Add the rice noodles and soya beans to the wok and stir-fry for 1 minute, then gently fold in the peanut sauce until everything is warmed through. Serve immediately with lime wedges and extra soy sauce, if liked.
